revised_title: Pendulum Observations at Kew Observatory for the Indian Trigonometrical Survey
tldr: The authors describe the base observations made at Kew Observatory with pendulums intended for use in the Indian Trigonometrical Survey. They discuss the experimental setup, methods of registering and reducing observations, and the corrections applied to the data. The study aims to investigate the influence of the Himalayan mountains on the intensity of terrestrial gravity in addition to its direction.
